title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.2 - Law enforcement participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.2 - Law enforcement participation

State Regulations

Any law enforcement agency may choose to participate in
this auto theft prevention program. The Division of Criminal Justice Services
shall supply Watch Your Car program decals to participating law enforcement
agencies for no fee as long as support funds are available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
72.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
